EN

XRP has experienced a significant decline, dropping nearly 59% from its July 2025 peak of $3.65 to approximately $1.59, as market liquidity shifts toward Bitcoin. Investors are speculating on the token's bottom, with analysts suggesting the price could fall further to between $1.2 and $1.39 before stabilizing. Technical analysis indicates a critical support level at $1.5, which, if held, could trigger a reversal. While short-term volatility is expected, with some forecasts targeting $1.45 by the end of February, long-term predictions remain bullish. Analysts like Crypto King anticipate a rebound towards $2.15 if current structures hold, and data from CoinCodex projects XRP could surpass $2 by mid-2026, reaching significantly higher valuations by 2030.

Key Points

  • XRP price has dropped nearly 59% from its July 2025 high to around $1.59.
  • Analysts predict potential support levels between $1.2 and $1.5 before a rebound occurs.
  • Crypto King forecasts a potential rally to $2.15 if the $1.5 support level holds.
  • Long-term forecasts from CoinCodex suggest XRP could reach $2 by mid-2026 and significantly higher values by 2030.

Article

XRP price seems to be battling a chaotic market situation where its price is compelled to be pushed to $1.5 in a new startling narrative. Ripple (XRP) has almost plunged 59% from its earlier high of $3.65 in July 2025. In addition to this, investors are now speculating about how low the XRP price can fall before a potential bounce back or rebound can occur.
